content: ['(spoilers ahead for the nov. 18 episode of ‚Äúthe walking dead‚Äù on amc)  maggie (lauren cohan) is gone, but she‚Äôs not dead.', 'last week‚Äôs episode of ‚Äúthe walking dead‚Äù revealed that she left the hilltop with the mysterious georgie during the big time jump that came at the end of rick grimes‚Äô final episode.', 'and it turns out that may have also been maggie‚Äôs final episode ever.', 'clearly, the creatives on the show and the folks at amc are hedging their bets by not killing her off.', 'but it‚Äôs entirely possible she‚Äôll never appear on ‚Äúthe walking dead‚Äù ever again.', 'we had heard rumblings of cohan‚Äôs exit from the series all year, following stories of a contentious contract dispute in which cohan wanted equal pay with other longtime series regulars andrew lincoln and norman reedus.', 'after signing on to abc‚Äôs ‚Äúwhiskey cavalier,‚Äù which will debut mid-season, cohan did say she would be able to come back to ‚Äúthe walking dead‚Äù for at least part of season 9.  also read: walking dead: everything we know, and think we know, about georgie  but it looks like that part of the season is now over, as ‚Äútwd‚Äù showrunner angela kang has confirmed that they don‚Äôt have plans for her to appear again in season 9. and on the episode of ‚Äútalking dead‚Äù after the season 9 mid-season finale, chris hardwicke read a statement from the producers which re-confirmed that cohan won‚Äôt be back this season but that ‚Äúmaggie‚Äôs story is not done‚Äù and that they ‚Äúhope to have her back‚Äù at some point in the future.', 'this all probably feels like it‚Äôs coming totally out of left field, considering how maggie did not get any kind of real sendoff.', 'her final (as far as we know) episode also being rick‚Äôs last didn‚Äôt help, since the episode basically functioned as rick‚Äôs death episode.', 'but what amc is doing with rick may also be the path for wrapping up maggie‚Äôs story.', 'two weeks ago, at the end of their final episode, rick ended up being airlifted by helicopter away from virginia, and what happens to him wherever he ends up will be the subject of a series of movies.', 'also read: heres what you need to know about that talking zombie on the walking dead  meanwhile, it‚Äôs long been theorized that the helicopter belongs to the same group that georgie hails from ‚Äî the commonwealth, an actual large city of people in ohio.', 'if that theory pans out, and georgie‚Äôs people are also the helicopter‚Äôs people, then there‚Äôs plenty of reason for rick and maggie to cross paths in this new corner of the ‚Äúwalking dead‚Äù universe.', 'but everything remains shrouded in mystery, and it sounds like nobody involved actually knows at this time what maggie‚Äôs fate will end up being.', 'if georgie actually is with the commonwealth, then the subject of maggie is going to have to come up again sooner or later ‚Äî the commonwealth is the next big storyline in the comics after the whisperer war that is about to begin on the show.', 'also read: apocalypse not yet?', 'first walking dead without andrew lincoln sees steady ratings  so, at least, you probably shouldn‚Äôt expect a heath (corey hawkins) situation ‚Äî remember how he went out scavenging with tara and then just never came back, his fate still undetermined?', 'maggie is so important that her fate will have to be dealt with at some point in the next couple seasons of ‚Äúthe walking dead,‚Äù even if lauren cohan never comes back.', 'just don‚Äôt expect closure any time soon.']
comments: ['the best news of the year', 'the entire walkingdead fandom just released the breath we‚Äôve all been holding for a while thewalkingdead twdfamily', 'otherwise the plotting against richonne scene would make no sense', 'didn‚Äôt even know she was gonna leave possibly', 'me happy to hear laurencohan will be back for season 9 twdfamily', 'blink twice if you need help', 'yes will she finally start to show she‚Äôs pregnant', 'looks like she‚Äôs been taken care since a long time but she still wanted more', 'yesssss it‚Äôs about damn time they took care of our girl', 'so she was working for free with 300k per episode bless her good soul']
title: ["'walking dead': here's why maggie is for sure gone for the rest of season 9 -- and maybe forever"]

content: ['prince philip, duke of edinburgh, was hospitalized tuesday evening due to an infection caused by a pre-existing condition, according to the bbc.', 'queen elizabeth‚Äôs husband is being monitored at king edward vii hospital in london as a precautionary measure, the bbc reports.', 'last month, the family announced that 96-year-old philip will be stepping away from public duties in the fall and begin moving toward retirement.', 'his hospitalization forced him to miss the opening of parliament on wednesday.', '‚Äúprince philip is in good spirits and is disappointed to be missing the state opening of parliament and royal ascot,‚Äù said buckingham palace in a statement on wednesday.', '‚Äúher majesty is being kept informed and will attend royal ascot as planned this afternoon.‚Äù  as per tradition, the queen gave a speech to parliament wednesday morning announcing the government‚Äôs legislative agenda.', 'this year‚Äôs speech had dramatically less fanfare surrounding it, with the queen arriving by car rather than horse-drawn carriage and wearing a suit and hat instead of ceremonial robes and a crown.', 'this is the first time with ‚Äúreduced ceremonial events‚Äù since 1974, according to the bbc.', 'officials said the dressing down of the ceremony is due to time constraints placed by the special election and conflicts with queen elizabeth‚Äôs schedule.']
comments: ['prayers of love sent to him']
title: ['prince philip hospitalized in london with an infection']

content: ['the day has finally come when stick and liquid concealer fight it out to see who is the best.', 'let us start by saying even if your skin is clear and has no blemishes, concealer is a great tool to keep you looking young and fresh.', 'touching up under your eyes with concealer will help them look more alive and bright.', 'the two fighters  let us get to know the competitors:  camouflage stick concealers and liquid light reflecting concealers    it has taken a long time for someone to do it but finally in 2008 myego launched the first liquid concealer for men.', 'solid concealers or camouflage sticks have been around for a long time.', 'so what is the difference between the two?', 'it‚Äôs simple really.', 'solid concealer‚Äôs main purpose is to cover up spots, blemishes and small imperfections on the skin.', 'they are primarily for very small areas on the face.', 'if you need to cover larger areas like under-eye circles then solid concealers become very noticeable because of their texture making it obvious you are wearing make-up.', 'liquid concealer smoothly blends into your skin‚Äôs natural tone to hide away dark circles under the eyes leaving you looking fresh and healthy.', 'why has it taken so long for someone to come up with a liquid concealer?', 'most people think a foundation would be just as good a substitute for a liquid concealer.', 'well they are wrong.', 'foundation does not cover up under eye circles or other blemishes as well as a concealer because foundation is normally the same colour or slightly darker shade than your natural skin tone.', 'liquid concealer is normally lighter than your skin tone and therefore brightens up your eyes.', 'you can not apply foundation to a small area of the face without it standing out where as a concealer blends in smoothly to cover up small areas of the face.if you are lucky enough not to need foundation but sometimes just need a ‚Äòlittle something‚Äô to brighten up your face before going out or after a late night out, this is the product for you.', 'myego cover select concealer is an easy to apply liquid concealer that refreshes and brightens your complexion giving a healthy natural look.', 'by moh dehghani- production director, myego cosmetics.']
title: ['liquid concealer vs stick concealer']

content: ['reality personality jon gosselin continues to spend time with his daughter hannah.', 'the father of eight posted a festive instagram of the two on wednesday, writing ‚Äúhappy 4th of july!!!', 'üá∫üá∏‚Äù  get push notifications with news, features and more.', 'jon, 41, and kate gosselin, 43, finalized their divorce in 2009. since the former jon & kate plus 8 stars‚Äô separation, jon has been focused on his djing career and battled his ex-wife for custody of the sextuplets and 17-year-old twins mady and cara.', 'though he wished them a happy birthday via instagram in october, jon remains estranged from the twins.', 'in august 2016, mady and cara told people that they weren‚Äôt speaking to their father, who had given interviews to some media outlets about their strained relationship.', '‚Äúhe makes it seem like we‚Äôre being kept from him, which is insane,‚Äù mady said.', '‚Äúhe should maybe spend some time thinking about why we don‚Äôt want to see him, and maybe realize that if he ever does want a relationship with us, talking about us on tv is not the way to make that happen.‚Äù  larsen & talbert  ‚Äúhe doesn‚Äôt even know us,‚Äù she added.', '‚Äúhow can he dare to talk about us?‚Äù  but jon has been spending plenty of time with hannah, including at a father‚Äôs day weekend dinner with his girlfriend colleen at buddakan in atlantic city, new jersey, last month.', 'in may, jon and hannah celebrated her 14th birthday together and paid a visit to her brother collin, who is currently enrolled in a program away from home for children with special needs.', 'jon & kate plus 8 aired from 2007 to 2009 before being rebranded as kate plus 8 following the couple‚Äôs divorce.', 'kate will return to television this fall with a tlc dating series, kate plus date.']

content: ['even seasoned royal correspondents have been left exhausted and in awe of meghan‚Äôs work ethic, despite a number pitfalls including warnings against travelling while pregnant.', 'writing for australian news website, honey, an exhausted juliet rieden told of how this tour has seen the royal couple gain an international seal of approval, while sending ‚Äú her circadian rhythms into meltdown.‚Äù  she said: ‚Äúas a seasoned royal correspondent, i like to think i‚Äôm well versed in the madness and mayhem of royal tours but this inaugural commonwealth love-in with the duke and duchess of sussex had surprises at every turn and a pace that has sent my circadian rhythms into meltdown.', '‚Äúit started with a baby announcement that blind-sided us all.', 'while the tabloids have been on bump watch since the couple announced their engagement, no-one really believed that meghan would embark on a 16-day marathon tour with 76 engagements while pregnant.', 'even the uk royal watchers weren‚Äôt in on this secret, which is saying something.', '‚Äúof course ‚Äòpregnant women works‚Äô, is not the stuff of headlines, this is 2018 after all.', 'but the royal couple weren‚Äôt just touring australia and new zealand; fiji and tonga were an important part of the itinerary, nations beloved by her majesty who were aching for a royal visit, especially one from the house of windsor‚Äôs new super couple.‚Äù']

title: ["meghan's royal tour success: how duchess won over royal fans on her first tour"]

content: ['what‚Äôs the most you‚Äôve done for your siblings?', 'let them raid your closet?', 'hide their embarrassing baby pics?', 'tell them they‚Äôre loved?', 'for cindy crawford‚Äôs 18-year-old son, presley gerber, the answer is found in the ink.', 'on thursday, presley shared an instagram photo of a brand-new tattoo on his body.', 'to many of his followers suprise, the arm tat was dedicated to his younger sister, 16-year-old model sister kaia gerber.', 'her first name in a slim script above the number 23 written in roman numerals are visible on his left tricep:  23 a post shared by presley (@presleygerber) on feb 15, 2018 at 3:23pm pst  gerber turned to celebrity-favorite tattoo artist jon boy (kendall jenner and hailey baldwin are clients) for the new piece of art, and kaia was apparently there to watch him do it during new york fashion week, according to jon boy‚Äôs instagram.', 'nyfw a post shared by c/s ‚à¥jon‚úûboy‚à¥ p/v (@jonboytattoo) on feb 15, 2018 at 6:55pm pst  on instagram stories, kaia wrote ‚Äúbest big bro ever‚Äù along with the same photo presley shared, so she clearly likes the piece in her honor.', 'while we‚Äôre not sure what the number ‚Äú23‚Äù could stand for, we do know one thing: fans have mixed feelings about the piece.', 'honestly, it‚Äôs a sweet gesture for presley to recognize his love for his sister in such a permanent way, but not everyone feels this way.', 'in the comments, some fans expressed their opinion, writing, ‚Äúweird af but ok‚Äù and ‚Äúomg wtf‚Äù while others quickly came to his defense, explaining that they too have tattoos of their siblings‚Äô names.', 'related: quiz‚Äîhow well do you know celebrity tattoos?', '‚Äúdont judge him because he decided to do something for her sister, you can make an opinion but that opinion doesnt have to hurt; so if you say how can anyone tattoo their sisters name you are kind of laughing at them, i dont know i would do that for my brother, but if he did, i look up to him for the great capacity of love he has,‚Äù one user wrote.', 'tattooing the names of close family members isn‚Äôt really all that bizarre.', 'drew barrymore, for instance, has the names of her daughters olive and frankie on her wrist (below), while angelina jolie has seven geographical coordinates on her left bicep (they represent the location where each of her children was born).', 'sisters tia and tamerya mowry have a tattoo of the word ‚Äújumelles‚Äù on their wrists, which means twins in french.']
comments: ['creepy weirdweirder than those brant siblings', 'thr hes going to regret it after they break up', 'who cares 17 teachers and children were killed and many more injured some perspective here', 'who the hell are these incestuous punks and why do they matter', 'but what about it is creepy', 'nope siblings is creepier imo although getting a celebrity tattooed onto your body is still very creepy']
title: ["kaia gerber's brother presley got a tattoo of her name and people have mixed feelings"]

content: ['lil peep died of an overdose of fentanyl and generic xanax, according to the pima country office of the medical examiner.', 'the rapper‚Äôs death was ruled as accidental by the medical examiner.', 'tmz reports that a cocktail of other drugs were also found in his system.', 'his blood tested positive for marijuana, cocaine and the painkiller tramadol, and his urine tested positive for those drugs, as well as opiates such as hydrocodone, generic dilauded, oxycodone and oxymorphone.', 'the medical examiner did not find alcohol in his system.', 'peep, whose real name was gustav √•hr, died last month in tucson, arizona, where he was supposed to hold a concert in support of his debut album, come over when you‚Äôre sober (part one).', 'he was 21. local authorities speculated that the circumstances around the rapper‚Äôs death were ‚Äúsuspicious,‚Äù though at the time the tucson police department was under the assumption his death was caused by a combination of xanax and other drugs.', 'the authorities said they were investigating text messages sent by a woman who‚Äôd visited peep‚Äôs tour bus before his death.', '‚Äúgbc [lil peep] high af because of me and my friend lol,‚Äù read one allegedly.', 'another supposedly read, ‚Äúhe passed the fuck out my brother called and i tried to get him to say hi to my brother but he wouldn‚Äôt wake up.‚Äù  a memorial for the rapper, who blended hip-hop with guitar-driven emo, was recently held in long beach, new york, featuring speakers and a public gathering.', 'in an interview with pitchfork, the rapper said he never took prescriptions for depression but enjoyed taking drugs.', '‚Äúi just like smoking weed and whatever other drug comes my way,‚Äù he said.', '‚Äúi don‚Äôt like to pay for [drugs].', 'i just like to get them for free.‚Äù']
title: ['lil peep cause of death revealed']

content: ['los angeles ‚Äî ellen degeneres couldn‚Äôt help but shed tears on the set of ‚Äúthe ellen show‚Äù thursday when wife portia de rossi gave her a very special birthday present for her 60th birthday.', '‚Äúit‚Äôs your 60th birthday and this gift had to be really special and it had to represent who you are and what you really care about,‚Äù portia told her.', '‚Äúnot just now, but what you‚Äôve always cared about.', 'de rossi played a video showing scenes from the life of dian fossey, one of ellen‚Äôs personal idols since she was a child.', 'fossey is well known for her work defending and documenting the mountain gorillas of rwanda‚Äôs virunga mountains.', 'degeneres, who has worked for years to help rescue animals around the world, has said for the last two years that she wishes she could be doing more, de rossi said.', 'that was the inspiration for the gift that brought tears to her wife‚Äôs eyes.', '‚Äúso for your birthday, ellen, i am bringing you and your hero, dian, together by building the ellen degeneres campus of the dian fossey gorilla fund,‚Äù portia said.', '‚Äúellen, you will carry on dian‚Äôs legacy by giving them a permanent home in rwanda.', 'now, you will join dian as a protector and champion of these amazing animals, the mountain gorillas.', 'not only that, portia has also created the ellen degeneres wildlife fund to help protect vulnerable species around the world.', '‚Äúwhen we got married portia‚Äôs line was it‚Äôs good to be loved, it‚Äôs profound to be understood, and she understands me because that is the best gift anybody could have given me,‚Äù ellen said.', 'i am proud, humbled, honored and deeply grateful to get to introduce you to my amazing new wildlife fund.', '‚Äúit‚Äôs good to be loved.', 'it‚Äôs profound to be understood.‚Äù thank you, portia.', 'https://t.co/kzllu43mki ‚Äî ellen degeneres (@theellenshow) february 2, 2018']
comments: ['omg is this show still on lol', 'hope she got a bible', 'this is whats wrong with this country', 'this is news it doesn‚Äôt even qualify as clickbait']
title: ['ellen degeneres cries after receiving the ‚Äòbest birthday gift‚Äô from portia de rossi']

content: ['you didnt actually think taylor swift wouldnt make some sort of appearance at the 2017 american music awards, now did you?', 'though the look what you made me do singer unfortunately wasnt physically present at the show, she surprised the crowd with a quick video appearance in which she congratulated diana ross for receiving the lifetime achievement award.', '{position1: {artist: {bio: , id: 33221, name: taylor swift}, catalog_type: artist, description: , id: 33221, name: taylor swift, related: [{bio: , id: 30421361, name: shawn mendes}, {bio: , id: 30960173, name: hailee steinfeld}, {bio: , id: 543619, name: meghan trainor}, {bio: , id: 30693365, name: dove cameron}, {bio: , id: 418015, name: ellie goulding}, {bio: , id: 381295, name: christina perri}, {bio: , id: 678625, name: ariana grande}], tagged: false, type: catalog}}  during the video, taylor thanked diana for paving the way in the music industry.', 'i dont personally know anyone in music who hasnt been inspired by you or influenced by you, she said.', 'you are elegant and fierce and strong and brave, and you have paved the way for everyone who does what we do now, including me.', 'so thank you.', 'allow us to remind you that diana presented taylor with the dick clark award for excellence at the amas back in 2014. that just makes taylors shout-out this year even sweeter!']
title: ['taylor swift made a surprise amas appearance to honor diana ross']

content: ['looks like the ace of cakes will be shopping for a wedding cake of his own!', 'food network star and popular pastry chef duff goldman is officially engaged to writer johnna colbry.', city cakes, a bakery with locations in los angeles and baltimore.', 'getty images | eugene gologursky  the big announcement  goldman announced his happy news on instagram, where he revealed that the idea to propose suddenly gripped him one morning, when he realized he ‚Äúcan‚Äôt imagine living another day without her in my life.‚Äù  check out the sweet post below:  ‚Äúi didn‚Äôt plan this out, it just happened and it was so glaringly obvious that i couldn‚Äôt have stopped it if i wanted to,‚Äù goldman wrote on april 3.', '‚Äúi asked her to marry me.', 'she said yes.', 'i cannot imagine a state of happiness that is more intense than whatever i‚Äôm feeling right now.', 'my heart just might burst.', 'i love you muffin.‚Äù  related: gordon ramsay says he once lost 50 pounds to save his marriage  an unexpected ring choice  goldman‚Äôs words are so sweet, but what‚Äôs up with the ring made of string?', '‚Äúi‚Äôm sorry i didn‚Äôt have a real ring,‚Äù goldman wrote.', '‚Äúi hope you don‚Äôt mind butcher‚Äôs twine, i am a chef, after all.‚Äù  how romantic!', 'colbry then shared them same photo, along with her own announcement, on instagram, writing, ‚Äúofficially my ride or die.', 'my forever muffin.', 'my buffalo.', 'i‚Äôm so crazy about you @duffgoldman and i can‚Äôt wait to spend the rest of my life going on adventures with you!', 'üòä hnnnnggg‚Äù  a look at goldman‚Äôs talents  goldman has been working in kitchens for nearly three decades, and he opened his own cake shop back in 2000. if you haven‚Äôt seen some of his creations, prepare to be wowed!', 'goldman shared this geode-topped stunner on instagram with a note that the geode is made entirely of sugar.', 'this ‚Äúsplatoon‚Äù-themed cake made for a kids‚Äô birthday party is pretty awesome.', 'and check out this ice skate cake.', 'toe pick, anyone?', 'his bakery has been behind such creations as the cake for barack obama‚Äôs 2012 inauguration.', 'the cake on the left is the one i made for president obamas inauguration 4 years ago.', 'the one on the right is trumps.', 'i didnt make it.', 'ü§î pic.twitter.com/qjxpcfphii ‚Äî duff goldman (@duffgoldman) january 21, 2017  i don‚Äôt know who‚Äôs going to make the wedding cake, but that will be a lot of pressure for some lucky baker!', 'congratulations to the happy couple.', 'related: this man proposed to his girlfriend while playing ‚Äúspeak out‚Äù, and she couldn‚Äôt understand what he was saying!']

content: ['artist, dj, and producer tim bergling, a.k.a.', 'avicii, died friday afternoon in oman, according to a statement from his rep. he was 28.', '‚Äúit is with profound sorrow that we announce the loss of tim bergling, also known as avicii,‚Äù the statement reads.', '‚Äúhe was found dead in muscat, oman this friday afternoon local time, april 20th.', 'the family is devastated and we ask everyone to please respect their need for privacy in this difficult time.', 'no further statements will be given.‚Äù  one of the most popular and successful electronic dance-music artists of all time ‚Äî he scored a no.', '4 hit on the billboard 200 in 2013 with ‚Äúwake me up‚Äù and regularly appeared in the top 5 of forbes‚Äô ‚Äúhighest-paid djs‚Äù lists ‚Äî he retired from live performing in 2016 at the peak of his success, citing health reasons.', 'he had suffered from health problems for several years, including acute pancreatitis, in part due to excessive drinking.', 'he had his gallbladder and appendix removed in 2014.  he posted the following statement on his website last year:  ‚Äúwe all reach a point in our lives and careers where we understand what matters the most to us.', 'for me it‚Äôs creating music.', 'that is what i live for, what i feel i was born to do.', 'related celebrities who died in 2018  last year i quit performing live, and many of you thought that was it.', 'but the end of live never meant the end of avicii or my music.', 'instead, i went back to the place where it all made sense ‚Äì the studio.', 'the next stage will be all about my love of making music to you guys.', 'it is the beginning of something new.', 'hope you‚Äôll enjoy it as much as i do.‚Äù  bergling was born in stockholm on sept. 8, 1989. he began djing as a teenager and released his first single in 2007. he released a large number of singles and remixes in the following years and rapidly built a reputation as a live act.', 'he broke through with his 2010 hit ‚Äúseek bromance,‚Äù which charted in several european countries; he signed a publishing deal with emi the same year.', 'he explained his chosen dj name as ‚Äúthe lowest level of buddhist hell,‚Äù chosen because his real name was already being used by another tim bergling on myspace.', 'his 2011 single ‚Äúlevels,‚Äù which was later nominated for a grammy award, vaulted him into the mainstream, charting in multiple european countries and topping the chart in his native sweden.', '‚Äúsunshine,‚Äù his 2012 collaboration with david guetta, was nominated for a grammy for best dance recording.', 'in september of that year, he became the first dj to headline new york‚Äôs prestigious radio city music hall; at those two shows, he previewed a new song with mike posner titled ‚Äústay with you.‚Äù  his proper debut album, ‚Äútrue,‚Äù was released on september 2013, much of which was previewed during his headlining set at the ultra music festival earlier that year.', 'the album featured ‚Äúwake me up,‚Äù a collaboration with aloe blacc, which topped the charts in multiple countries across the world and was no.', '1 for a record 14 weeks on billboard‚Äôs dance/electronic songs chart; it was also the u.k.‚Äôs fastest-selling single of 2013. other singers on the album included adam lambert and audra mae.', 'he also worked with madonna during this period and contributed to two songs on her 2015 album ‚Äúrebel heart,‚Äù although both parties seemed unhappy with the collaboration and avicii said the final versions were quite different from his demos.', 'the extent of his popularity was reflected in a 2014 ‚Äúsaturday night live‚Äù digital short called ‚Äúwhen will the bass drop?,‚Äù with comic andy samberg playing a fictional mega-dj named ‚Äúdavvincii‚Äù (although he was made up to look more like david guetta).', 'however, as his popularity rose, his health declined.', 'he was hospitalized in march 2014 and cancelled several tour appearances; not long after, he collaborated with carlos santana and wyclef on the official fifa world cut anthem ‚Äúwe will find a way.‚Äù also that year, he produced a song on coldplay‚Äôs album ‚Äúghost stories.‚Äù he released his second full-length album, ‚Äústories,‚Äù in october 2015.  in march of 2016, he performed at the ultra music festival, premiering new material, but 10 days later announced that he was retiring from performing.', 'he made a final live appearance in august in ibiza.', 'in december, he parted ways with longtime manager ash pournouri.', 'in august of 2017 he released a six-track ep entitled ‚Äúavici,‚Äù which he said was the first of three installments that would be his next album.', 'he followed a month later with a full-length documentary called ‚Äútrue stories,‚Äù which was largely about his retirement.', 'in it, promoters are seen trying to convince him to continue touring, even though he‚Äôs in obvious physical pain.', '‚Äúi looked at myself like, ‚Äòf‚Äî, you should‚Äôve really stood up for yourself more there.', 'come on, tim!,‚Äù he said of the documentary to rolling stone in an interview published last september.', '‚Äúwhy didn‚Äôt i stop the ship earlier?‚Äù  ‚Äúi needed to figure out my life,‚Äù he continued.', '‚Äúthe whole thing was about success for the sake of success.', 'i wasn‚Äôt getting any happiness anymore.', 'now that i have more time in the studio, i want to learn as much about other genres as possible.', 'that‚Äôs what i love the most ‚Äì having a session with nile rodgers, for instance, and getting an understanding of music that‚Äôs invaluable.‚Äù  related content  musicians, celebrities pay tribute to avicii  avicii‚Äôs biggest hits (listen)  ‚Äòavicii: true stories‚Äô documentary reveals star dj‚Äôs struggles with health, fame and early retirement  avicii‚Äôs life and career in photos  popular on variety']
